document_data.name: Baths of Drusus
document_data.basicrefs: {{cite book/Desert of Desolation|104}}{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|105}}
document_data.mainbody: The '''Baths of Drusus''' were a ruined bathhouse in [[Medinat Muskawoon]].
document_data.Structure: A greenish stone building {{SI|200|ft}} by {{SI|120|ft}}, it was now open save for the walls and vaulted ceiling on the northeastern end.
document_data.Inhabitants: Two [[wraith]]s remained in the building; there were four golden links hidden in the drains.
